name: simpleextchat
description: ExtJS Chat App on MySQL at backend

scripts.assets:build:all: npm run assets:build:development && npm run assets:build:production
scripts.assets:build:production: cd assets/ChatApp && npx sencha app build production
scripts.assets:build:development: cd assets/ChatApp && npx sencha app build development
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:assets && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:logs
scripts.clean:assets: npx rimraf assets/build && npx rimraf assets/ChatApp/bootstrap.* && npx rimraf assets/ChatApp/classic.* && npx rimraf assets/ChatApp/modern.*
scripts.clean:server: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.docker:build:all: npm run docker:build:prepare && npm run docker:build:db && npm run docker:build:backend && npm run docker:build:frontend && npm run docker:build:clear
scripts.docker:run:all: npm run docker:run:db && npm run docker:run:backend && npm run docker:run:frontend
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:build:all && npm run docker:run:all
scripts.server:start:production: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=info NODE_ENV=production "npx pm2 start index.js"
scripts.server:start:development: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development "npx pm2 start index.js"
scripts.start: npm run assets:build:production && npm run server:start:production

author: Max Vorobyev
